extName.message: CAPTCHA Solver: auto hCAPTCHA reCAPTCHA freely

extDesc.message: solve hCAPTCHA and reCAPTCHA using AI on any pages. Seamless integration with NoCoding Data Scraper for easier data collection

lbl_run_scope.message: Auto detect and solve CAPTCHA on

lbl_rm_addon.message: active tab and tabs from partner add-ons synchronously

lbl_comment_2.message: Please take 5 seconds to share your comments.

tip_partner_tab_1.message: With the partner add-ons, you can:

tip_partner_tab_2.message:
• solve multiple CAPTCHAs in parallel
  • make solving faster by adjusting delay time
  • declare post actions after CAPTCHA solved
  • specify the type of CAPTCHA to solve

tip_partner_tab_3.message: to make browser automation easily on different websites.
